Comment:
Dilip Kumar In a nation which idolized Cricket as the only sport and chasing billions generated as revenues other sports, players and infra is kind of not so interesting.
Firstly hearty congratulations üéä to Rohan Bopanna for this fantastic achievement. We need such milestones to inspire the next generation to make sports a lucrative career.

A billion population and what's our global achievement in other sports, world events ex.Fifa etc. nil for the past 75 years. 

What does it take to do good - the list is long...but do we really want to achieve or scale greatest in sports ?

We need to mature our thought process to excel ...that I don't foresee in our times atleast...
